summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6010 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, D. T. Denny's Waterfront Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue West and 3rd Avenue West from West Harrison Street to West Thomas Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80839, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
